<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Instance Price</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/instances/get_price"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve the price for creating a new instance.
